titles.title: To amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to provide that the same limitation on contributions to candidates shall apply to multicandidate political committees and other persons.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR H5987)
Referred to the House Committee on House Oversight.

bill.summary: 06/15/1995--Introduced. Amends the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to provide that the same limitation on candidate contributions shall apply to multicandidate political committees and other persons.
